remarks: A morphism of non-unital rings is a function.  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)
statement:
rngcbas.c $e |- C = ( RngCat ` U ) $.
rngcbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
rngcbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngchomfval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
rngchom.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
rngchom.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
elrngchom $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( X H Y ) -> F : ( Base ` X ) --> ( Base ` Y ) ) ) $.
